reviewText: Probably, the greatest President when it came to using the language to move a nation, this was just a series of low quality newsreal footage. Don't waste your money. Just use uTube to get better coverage and quality.

I met President Kennedy in Santa Monica. what a thrill that was. The year was 1962 and he and his brother had saved America and the world from experiencing a nuclear exchange with Russia. I shook his hand twice. Once on land and once in the Pacific Ocean. Thats a story for another day. He exuded kindness and sincerity.

Listen to his voice as he speaks and jokes about politics. Hear Ye Hear Ye.
Remember him well. He belonged to all of us. His voice is soothing.

You would think thst this DVD would actually have the speech for JFK's inauguration. All it really is is an old news clip you would see in a movie theatre in the 50's with narration talking over it. Home made...dont buy!

15 John F Kennedy films is just fine, the video quality is quite good on dvd. I am like an archivist owning an historical and intimate look at the Kennedy family. I was called crazy by a lot of people for saying that I was a blood kennedy relative. At ancestry dot com It was proven that David Dougherty morgan is a blood cousin of President Jack Kennedy. I brought my printout to church and someone said where did you get that incredulously. People I would like to see in Kennedy and Windsor videos are Brent Butterworth, Katle Sackhoff whom I met briefly at a busstop you like Ethan Hunt character huh Katie Sackhoff, accurate tip thanks. Keira Knightly, Mary Kate and Ashley Olsen, Brittany Ashton Holmes star of the little rascals that President Kennedy has watched, Natalie Portman, Julia AR Morgan who sang before over 8000 people at a London Knights Game and has solod as well yay Julia. Julia is Named after a German Princess Julia from the 1860s of Saxe Coburg, Keira Knightly would also be fun to see at a Kennedy family reunion. The Black watch video is in 1963 and is upsetting to me as Jack was not seen in public much after that. Remember the American University peace speech of June 1963, remember. Tanks to Amazon.com for allowing a blood kennedy relative to have freedom of speech.
